briefTitle: Chilean Maternal & Infant Cohort Study II (CHiMINCs-II)
officialTitle: The Chilean Maternal and Infant Nutrition Cohort Study II
conditions: Breast Density, Body Composition, Nutritional Status, Mental Health Issue
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Breast absolute (AFGV) fibro-glandular volume measured by DXA technique
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* 18 or more years of age
* Gestation \<15 weeks at first prenatal visit
* No intention to move outside the city of Santiago in the next to years

Exclusion Criteria:

* High-risk pregnancy (i.e., preeclampsia, pre- existing diabetes)
* Pre-existing cancer or family history of breast cancer
* Intended to migrate from the public to the private health care system
